text: Crazy Nights is a studio album by the American hard rock/heavy metal band Kiss. It was released on September 18, 1987. "Crazy Crazy Nights" was the first song released from the album. It reached #4 in the UK. == Track listing == *Crazy Crazy Nights *I'll Fight Hell To Hold You *Bang Bang You *No, No, No *Hell Or High Water *My Way *When Your Walls Come Down *Reason To Live *Good Girl Gone Bad *Turn On The Night *Thief In The Night Category:Kiss (band) albums Category:1987 albums
title: Crazy Nights
